description:
Sponsorship Sales Manager Job Description:

We are seeking a bright, talented, driven individual to join our sales staff at the state-of-the-art ballpark in Hartford for the Hartford Yard Goats. We are offering a dynamic, challenging, and fun learning environment, an opportunity to work with an industry leader, and a beautiful growing community to call home. This position will work with the Executive Director of Business Development, and the General Manager, Director, to achieve the objectives of the Sponsorship Sales department. The right candidate will have sales experience in the Greater Hartford market, established relationships, and should be able to hit the ground running. Strong communication skills are a must, and the right candidate will be detail oriented and be extremely comfortable working with business and organizational leaders in the community.

General Responsibilities:
• Prospects and sells static & digital signage, print advertising, digital advertising, media, promotions, and more.
• Helps to provide customer service to existing clients.
• Prospects and sells ballpark events, such as stadium rentals, weddings, concerts and more.
• Aggressively build new relationships through cold calling, outside appointments, and building tours.
• Responsible for servicing and up-selling existing clients.
• Involvement in game day activities, promotions for the Hartford Yard Goats and Dunkin' Park and outside functions including luncheons, business shows, conventions, etc.
• Must meet all predetermined activity and sales goals.

EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
• Sales experience, ideally venue, media, or out-of-home, in the Greater Hartford market.
• Excellent customer service skills
• The ability to work evenings, weekends, and long hours.
• Must be able to work with computers, particularly Windows and Microsoft Office products such as Excel and Word, and have knowledge of ticket and database programs.
• Being bilingual in Spanish is a plus.

We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
